dcterms:creator: P. Schrodt
J. Ulfelder
dcterms:description: The World Atrocities Dataset (WAD) contains event data related to political atrocities, providing detailed descriptions of events and associated victim counts.
dcterms:title: World Atrocities Dataset (WAD)

dcterms:creator: O. A. Lewis
E. Chenoweth
J. Pinckney
dcterms:description: The Non-violent and Violent Campaigns and Outcomes 3.0 (NAVCO) dataset provides information on various campaigns, detailing their tactics and outcomes, including victim counts.
dcterms:title: Non-violent and Violent Campaigns and Outcomes 3.0 (NAVCO)

dcterms:description: The European Media Monitor (EMM) dataset aggregates multilingual news articles and provides structured data for analysis, including victim counts from reported events.
dcterms:title: European Media Monitor (EMM)
